title: doc: web site needs re-organization, should mention more external resources
body:
There is section on golang.org under "Documentation" entitled "The Go
Community", but it doesn't provide links to GoDoc.org or any of the other fine web
sites built by the Go community.

It makes me sad when a newcomer is unaware of excellent resources for finding
third-party packages and learning about Go.
https://plus.google.com/107537752159279043170/posts/eNDq7JCtPiC

Linking to a separate Wiki page would be the minimal effort and avoid promoting any
specific service over another. 

A blog on the Go community (including events like GopherCon) would be nice too. Thanks!
